summary: Determined and proactive Administrative Specialist who works with a sense of urgency to anticipate the needs of senior-level executives. Thrives in a fast paced, dynamic environment.

experience.title: Centralized Administrative Support
experience.description: Scheduling appointments, maintaining calendars, managing email; Arrange travel and lodging reservations; Arrange meetings including communication preparation and equipment; Order supplies and equipment for leaders; Follow protocol in handling confidential and sensitive information; Run dashboard summary reports for Sales Leader; Complete Marketplace Compliance process for field marketing promotions for Sales Leader.

experience.title: Data Entry Clerk
experience.description: Verified information in the computer system; Identified and resolved system and account issues; Used attention to detail to provide quick and accurate labor for a long-term assignment; Maintained data entry requirements by following data program techniques and procedures.

experience.title: Tutor Counselor
experience.description: Used attention to detail to provide quick and accurate labor for a long-term assignment; Maintained data entry requirements by following data program techniques and procedures; Created timeline and goals to complete assignments; Verified information in the computer system was up-to-date and accurate.

experience.title: Executive Assistant/Special Events
experience.description: Responsible for direct customer service, worksite direction, food preparation and serving, and creative direction for a catering company servicing a diverse clientele and broad range of events with high guest counts (including mayoral inaugurations, class and family reunions, weddings, retirement parties, etc.). Executed executive assistance: managed events calendars, scheduling/booking, directed team in owner's absence, addressed customer concerns, tracked employees hours. Worksite assistance: setup of event locations, loading/unloading equipment and supplies, establishing food stations and 'behind-the-scenes' prep areas, and setting up guest areas and tables.
